text: Ruth Heller Aucott (born c. 1934) is an American former field hockey player and official. She played on the U.S. women's national field hockey team seven times from 1955 to 1967. She was one of the first people honored into the U.S. Field Hockey Association Hall of Fame. She was born in Abington, Pennsylvania. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:American ice hockey players Category:Sportspeople from Pennsylvania
title: Ruth Heller Aucott
